comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The New York Times had a pictorial page on the building of Weller's boat, and plans for the trip, on June 18, 1911.

A later story reported that Weller launched on July 16, 1911.
(NYT, 7-17-11.)

After that, NYT evidently lost interest in the Weller saga. Did he make it across? Did he make it back?

comment.author: 82017498@N03
comment._content: I believe Captain John Weller was my great grandfather.  I am working on my family tree.  Any information you have would be wonderful.  I am fascinated about the motor boat to Europe article.  klklein72107@yahoo.com

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to all of you for the information. Here's what I learned from the New York Times archive about Captain John Weller, and the fate of his journey: He was a boat builder in Paterson NJ and a member of the Little Falls Rod and Gun Club. His plan was to take his 50 foot motorboat, Romania, from New York up to Newfoundland and then across the Atlantic to Galway Bay in Ireland. His son, Robert Weller was among those on board. They took off mid July, but the boat ran ashore in Halifax July 25. All aboard survived.  A model of the Romania was on view at a Motor Boat Show at Madison Square Garden Feb. 21 to Mar. 4, 1911. Please share any other information you learn about Capt. Weller and the Romania.

comment.author: 82017498@N03
comment._content: Capt Weller made a boat called the Pan-American which made excursions of approx 100 people to Coney Island, but not sure if from Carlstadt Marina to Coney Island or not. Don't know for how long. ALso learned that he had a brother who was a symphony orchestra conductor in Prague.  Still trying to find out about him.  He and his family are on the 1910 census and the 1930 census but not on 1920 census, trying to find out where he was at that time. I have located my mother's cousin in PA, Capt Weller's granddaughter.  Am trying to get more information.  If you find anything else out would appreciate the info.  As soon as I learn more, will do the same. Thank you.

comment._content: Do you have the article about The Romania running ashore in Halifax July 25, 1911?  Would love for you to e-mail it to me at klklein72107@yahoo.com.  Capt John Weller was my great grandfather, my mom's grandfather.
